string.text:
A semi-automatic shotgun designed for military and law enforcement use, produced by Benelli and based on their renowned M4 design. It is chambered in 12-gauge and features a gas-operated action, allowing for fast follow-up shots with minimal recoil. The M1014 is highly regarded for its durability, versatility, and performance in close-quarters combat situations.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Italy
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Benelli
